data.name: Five Likes Please
data.detailed_description:
Five Likes Please is a fast-paced multiplayer arena shooter. Build your arsenal by obtaining new weapons and unlocking attachments. Obtain "likes" and buy powerful streaks, such as vehicles and power weapons. Choose from 40+ unique weapons to bring into battle, ranging from pistols to assault rifles to rocket launchers. Having quite a selection of weapons to choose from already, you are also able to completely customize each one using a gunsmith system. Choose carefully from the list of attachments available in order to suite your playstyle. Some notable features of this game include...

  • 70+ unique attachments
  • 40+ unique weapons
  • 50+ additional weapon skins, including WW2 weapons, laser guns, and even "tacticool" abominations
  • 14 maps, with more well on the way
  • 6 modes: Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, Point Capture, King of the Hill, Juggernaut, and Gun Game
  • A variety of equipment, vehicles, and power weapons
  • Modernized ballistics and recoil, complete with excessive screen shake and lens flare
  • Simple, stylistic graphics. This isn't AAA!

Now go out there and get some likes for us!

data.short_description: Five Likes Please is a fast-paced multiplayer arena shooter. Build your arsenal by obtaining new weapons and buying attachments. Obtain "likes" and buy powerful streaks, such as vehicles and power weapons. We know this game is bad, so as long as we can at least get five likes, that would be great.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
